pages.text: Make yourself a $(item)Supply Camp$(). This will give you a bed, furnace and storage. All for the cost of 11 Logs.$(br2)You may only place one Supply Camp!
A $(item)Supply Camp$() is a large structure you can place that will build a starting base. It requires flat clear area 16 meters by 17 meters. You must clear out any flowers or grass.
Now that you have a starting Camp, you might have realized that you can jump over the fence.
A Supply Camp comes stocked with goods to help you build a $(thing)Colony$().
